thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 7 of 62
thread.title: Andrew Rothman

author: Andrew Rothman
title: Andrew Rothman
text:
I've bought two or three templates from this service. Help is generally good, although anything beyond the basics is usually above the level of the live chat team. When I recently had an issue with a template, the support tech sent me a javascript to get around the problem.
Only negative experience I can recall was once when my issue with a template was elevated to senior tech level and Quote: d at a couple hundred dollars to solve, and I discovered that I just needed to copy and paste a file. My advice would be to do your own research as much as you can before contacting support because you may find the same solution they offer you faster and cheaper.
Still, recommended.
